intro: Peperomia parhamii var. glabra, commonly known as the smooth peperomia, is a compact, evergreen shrub native to the tropical regions of South America. It features glossy, ovate leaves that are typically a deep green with a waxy texture. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers in clusters, which are usually greenish-white in color. It thrives in bright, indirect light and prefers well-draining soil. Due to its low maintenance and attractive foliage, it is a popular choice for indoor gardening.
